medical_history.chief_complaint: A 28-year-old man presented multiple times with oral candidiasis and advanced symptoms suggestive of AIDS.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced oral candidiasis on three separate occasions over a nine-month period. He later reported dyspnea, dry cough, wheezing, low-grade fever, and significant weight loss of 60 lbs over the course of a year.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Patient has a history of advanced HIV disease that was undiagnosed until hospitalization.
medical_history.social_history: The patient was sexually active with multiple female partners and used condoms irregularly. Denied use of injection drugs but reported marijuana use.
